description: Fresh notes of shiso and mint provides lift to mellow umami flavour of sencha. An enduring finale and a pleasure to all senses.
Magnificently magical honey sweetness of Saffronais tame by the umami flavour of sencha. An enchanting delicious and flavorsome experience.
Soft floral acentuates sublime nature of Uji Sencha, complemented by sparkling notes of fresh lemon. A soothing blend for a perfect summer quencher.
Light and gentle blend with aroma of cherries and Ispahan Rose. The brew whispers of sweetness and romance in warm embrace.
Exquisite in taste, Saffronias elevates the intensity of sweet floral notes. The lingering creamy finish is the perfect treat to carry through the day.
Jubilant blend of herbs and rose hips lends a tartness to a fruity aroma of sencha. The combination projects a softer silhouette to the firm structure.
Obssessive combination of jasmine and rose for a distinctly floral palate. Individualistic, yet complementary for a matrimony of icons.
Flowery blend where lovely midnght Jasmine Silk Pearl meets crimson Saffronais for a subtle alchemy.
Soft notes of flowery hyacith and vanilla marries the elegance of honeyed Saffronais. When two royals meet, magic happens.
Healthy dose of delicious vanilla with citrus herbs. A functional brew that is tantalising on the taste buds.
Rich and robust with trail of smoke magnificiently entwined under layer of floral veil. A perfect tea for a comfortable refuge.
A glorious blend with exotic notes of Spanish saffron, pine smoke and white florals. An opulent tea with a sophisticated flair.
Complex yet smooth on the palate with soft sweetness of rose on the first sip. Fruity notes of lychee on the finish, this melodious pairing is ideal as a refreshing ice tea.
Robust and invigorating blend with accenting notes of fresh cut flowers. Touch of Middle Eastern mystic and Oriental finesse dreams of a surreal experience.
Elegant and refined blend of exotic spice with redolent black tea. A wholesome interpretation of a sweet escapade.
Elegant brew with an evened profile of bergamot and rose awaken the senses. The floral and citrus notes soothe the palate for a lasting impression
Fresh approach to a unique blend of mint and bergamot. An alluring experience that promises more adventure to come.
Eclectic combination of bergamot, lemon verbena, lemon myrtle, eucalyptus, lavender and rosemary. Treat your senses to a exclusive journey.
Bold yet dainty blend with delicate notes of Ispahan Rose. An indulgent combination, perfect for an afternoon retreat.
Enjoy a spirited brew with dose of shiso mint to brighten up the flavour. A combination that goes well after hearty feast.
